title: Governors Island National Monument: Field Trips
body: Field Trips       Results   Showing results 1-1 of 1    Sort By:  Title Date         Governors Island National Monument Bring 'Em Back Alive    Learn about the Civil War on Governors Island by meeting a variety of interesting people from the past, from soldiers and prisoners to laundresses and spies. Park rangers will help students explore the National Monument and learn about this fascinating time in American history.    Type:Field Trips
